name: Urcheck Development Senter
description:
Welcome to [Urcheck Development Senter]


We are all about [MISSING TEXT] here.


You will be running weapons and tactics tests here in testing area 5A-602.


Don’t mind the constant threat of termination from the TurretBots, if you fail you will simply be brought back at the beginning of your test area for the [VALUENOTAVAILABLEIN128BITSYSTEM]


And maybe one day you will finish your testing, but probably not.

[Utcheck Development Senter and Urcheck Inc. are not responsible or liable for any facilities closing while tests are still underway. Any faculty or works will be obligated to take care of themselves and presumed dead upon closing of the facilities.]



Gameplay Controls:


WASD - Move (+ Shift to Sprint)

Q/Scroll Up/Scroll Down - Swap weapons

Left Click to Fire

Right Click with Primary Weapon to Alternate Fire

Spacebar - Jetpacks

R - Reload
